title: Taylor Swift taking big move as her ‘priorities’ shifted around Travis Kelce; ‘Nashville is the place where…’ - Hindustan Times
summary:
Taylor Swift Moves to Nashville to Strengthen Bond with Travis Kelce

Publication Date: Dec 30, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Taylor Swift is relocating to Nashville, Tennessee, full-time to be closer to her boyfriend, Travis Kelce, reflecting a shift in her personal priorities.

  • The 35-year-old pop star is establishing roots in Nashville to strengthen her relationship with the NFL star.
  • Swift's decision marks a new outlook on life, moving away from her previous base in New York City.
  • Insiders report that her love for Kelce has profoundly shifted her priorities.
  • Nashville holds sentimental value for Swift, as it is where her career began.
  • She has attended numerous Chiefs games since they started dating in September.
“Taylor has grown up a lot in the past couple of years. Falling in love with Travis so deeply has shifted her priorities around a bit and has given her a new outlook on life.”

This move signifies a significant commitment in their relationship as they consider starting a family in the future.

title: Pushpa 2 box office collection day 26: Allu Arjun film remains steady even after three weeks, crosses ₹1160 crore - Hindustan Times
summary:

Date: Dec 30, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Pushpa 2, starring Allu Arjun, has continued to draw audiences even after three weeks of release, crossing ₹1160 crore at the box office.

  • The film collected approximately ₹6.65 crore on its fourth Monday.
  • Total box office collections stand at ₹1163.65 crore.
  • Week one gross was ₹725.8 crore, followed by ₹264.8 crore in week two and ₹129.5 crore in week three.
  • Despite controversies surrounding a tragic incident at a screening, the film maintained its audience appeal.
“We're extremely sorry for the family, and I will personally be there to support them in whatever way.” - Allu Arjun

The movie continues to have a significant impact at the box office, despite the challenges faced by its lead actor due to recent events.

title: Pawan Kalyan – Producers and directors failed to utilize my dates - 123telugu
summary:

Published on Dec 30, 2024 8:59 pm IST

In a recent media chit-chat session, AP Deputy CM and Powerstar Pawan Kalyan criticized producers and directors for not utilizing his available dates effectively for upcoming films.

  • Pawan Kalyan stated that he communicated his limited availability but the film teams were unprepared.
  • He noted that he worked more days than initially promised, highlighting production delays due to script readiness issues, particularly for 'Ustaad Bhagat Singh'.
  • He mentioned that the team of 'Hari Hara Veera Mallu' is focused on finalizing pre-visualization and intends to release this film first.
Pawan Kalyan: “I clearly told them that I would be working for only a specific time, but the makers of three films were not prepared well in advance.”

This situation highlights the challenges in film production scheduling and the importance of pre-planning in the film industry.

title: Baby John’s box office clues: From weak marketing to the Pushpa 2 tsunami, trade analysts reveal why Varun Dhawans big gamble misfired - Bollywood Hungama
summary:
Baby John’s Box Office Clues: Insights from Trade Analysts

Date: December 25, 2024 Source: Bollywood Hungama

The release of Baby John fell short of expectations, making only Rs. 11.25 crores on opening day and seeing a steep decline thereafter. Analysts discuss factors that led to its poor reception.

  • Opening day collection was subpar at Rs. 11.25 crores.
  • Second day drop to Rs. 5.13 crores and further to Rs. 3.25 crores on the third day.
  • Experts cite weak marketing strategies that failed to grab audience interest.
  • Trade veteran Taran Adarsh noted the film was outright rejected by audiences.
  • Distributor Raj Bansal expressed concerns over Varun Dhawan's popularity affecting the film.
  • The overwhelming success of Pushpa 2 overshadowed Baby John, drawing audiences away.
  • Analysts suggested postponed release could have led to better performance.
“The industry's expectations were high, but they were not met due to various factors,” said Atul Mohan, a trade analyst.

The substantial impact of Pushpa 2 illustrates the competition's effect on Baby John, with many viewers favoring repeat viewings of the former.
newTitle: Why baby John's Box Office Gamble Misfired: Insights from Trade Analysts

title: Vicky Kaushal reacts to Asha Bhosle's performance of Tauba Tauba, calls her an ‘absolute legend’ - Hindustan Times
Allu Arjun's arrest, Poonam Pandey’s cancer hoax, and more: 10 controversies that kept us talking in 2024 - CNBCTV18
summary:
Top 10 Controversies in Showbiz That Shook 2024

Date: December 13, 2024 Source: CNBC TV18

2024 in showbiz was anything but ordinary. From tragic incidents to legal battles and big PR stunts, the entertainment industry served drama with a side of disbelief. Here’s a comprehensive look at the 10 controversies that had everyone talking:

  • Allu Arjun: Stardom marred by tragedy: A tragic incident during a promotional event for Pushpa 2 led to a stampede, resulting in a woman's death and the actor's subsequent arrest.
  • Poonam Pandey’s death hoax: A failed PR stunt that backfired on Pandey, igniting outrage over trivializing cancer awareness.
  • Malayalam cinema’s #MeToo moment: Major revelations regarding harassment in the industry led to resignations and public discourse about systemic change.
  • Oscars outrage: Controversy erupted over India's Oscars entry, raising questions about the selection process.
  • Kangana Ranaut’s rollercoaster year: Frequent controversy surrounding Ranaut's comments and her film’s obstacles in gaining certification.
  • Ticket scams: The ED's investigation into ticket black marketing for concerts generated significant public anger.
  • Netflix’s IC 814 documentary: The omission of key details in a docuseries led to backlash and required clarifications from Netflix.
  • Nayanthara-Dhanush legal showdown: A legal dispute over documentary footage sparked discussions about intellectual property.
  • Kapil Sharma's offensive remark: Sharma faced backlash for a racially insensitive joke, prompting discussions on comedic boundaries.
  • Darshan’s murder charge: Kannada actor's involvement in a murder case shocked fans and stirred significant media attention.

This list highlights the tumultuous nature of the entertainment industry in 2024, with controversies affecting the public's perception and prompting discussions on deeper issues.
newTitle: Top 10 Controversies in Showbiz That Shook 2024

title: MAMAMOO’s Hwasa Admits To Once Having Anorexia And More - Koreaboo
summary:
MAMAMOO’s Hwasa Admits To Once Having Anorexia And More

Date: 8 hours ago | Source: Koreaboo

Hwasa from MAMAMOO bravely spoke about her past battle with anorexia during an episode of Body Documentary. She candidly shared her experiences from her time as a trainee and how she has since embraced a healthier lifestyle.

  • Hwasa revealed that she struggled with anorexia while training for her debut.
  • She described the pressures of the entertainment industry and unhealthy weight management practices among trainees.
  • Hwasa highlighted a specific incident where members of her group used diuretics to manage their weight.
  • She confessed to eating in secret to satisfy her cravings, leading to feelings of guilt and stress.
  • Now, she advocates for healthy body image and self-acceptance in the K-Pop industry.

I didn’t eat anything back then, because it was a period where I had to work hard, and I didn’t know what the right thing to do was... We would empty it all out, then weigh ourselves.

Hwasa

Hwasa's openness about her struggles serves as an inspiration, showing how far she has come and her commitment to promoting a positive message about body image in K-Pop.
newTitle: MAMAMOO's Hwasa Opens Up About Her Battle with Anorexia

title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Worldwide Box Office: Creates History, Becomes 1st Hindi-Dubbed South Film To Enter The 1000 Crore Club! - Koimoi
summary:
Pushpa 2 Makes Box Office History, First Hindi-Dubbed South Film to Cross 1000 Crore

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Koimoi

The Hindi-dubbed version of Pushpa 2 has achieved a remarkable milestone by entering the 1000 crore club after 25 days in theaters, making history as the first Hindi-dubbed South film to do so.

  • The film wrapped up its fourth weekend with a total gross of 908.89 crore in India.
  • Overseas gross was reported at 115 crore, leading to a worldwide total of 1023.89 crore.
  • Pushpa 2 follows the success of its predecessor, which gained immense popularity across social media and OTT platforms.
  • This makes Pushpa 2 the fourth Hindi film after Dangal, Pathaan, and Jawan to achieve such box office success.
“Simply unbelievable! The film still has enough fuel left, and it’ll be interesting to see how far it goes.”

Pushpa 2’s historic achievement reflects its significant cultural impact, setting new benchmarks for Hindi-dubbed films.
newTitle: Pushpa 2 Makes Box Office History, First Hindi-Dubbed South Film to Cross 1000 Crore

title: Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai actor Tannaz Irani on health challenges that left her in a wheelchair: ‘After surgery, my one leg was longer than other’ - The Indian Express
summary:
Tannaz Irani Reflects on Health Challenges and Resilience

Publication Date: December 30, 2024 Source: The Indian Express

Tannaz Irani, known for her roles in major films and television shows, faced significant health challenges in 2021 that left her in a wheelchair. In a recent podcast, she shared her journey of resilience and recovery.

  • Initially faced walking difficulties and dismissed them as weight gain.
  • Joined MMA to improve her health, which exacerbated her condition.
  • Eventually diagnosed with issues affecting her hips, knees, and back.
  • Underwent hip replacement surgery, discovering post-op that one leg was longer than the other.
“After the surgery, I realised that one leg was longer than the other and I completely freaked out... I felt that this was a cruel joke that somebody was playing on me.”

Tannaz's story highlights her struggle and determination to overcome severe health challenges, inspiring others with similar issues.
newTitle: Tannaz Irani Reflects on Health Challenges and Resilience

title: Shalini Passi says she married at 20, had a son at 21 but had one important condition for husband: ‘He should not…’ - The Indian Express
summary:
Shalini Passi: Marrying Young and Having a Child at 21, with No Regrets

Date: 2024-12-01, Source: Indian Express

Shalini Passi, known for her appearances in 'Fabulous Lives vs Bollywood Wives,' has shared her perspective on getting married at 20 and becoming a mother at 21. In an interview with Mojo Story, she expressed no regrets about her decision, describing it as a 'great move by the universe.'

  1. Shalini had an arranged marriage with Sanjay Passi, the owner of the PASCO group, after his family spotted her at a wedding.
  2. She had a condition for her arranged marriage: her husband should not drink, smoke, or gamble.
  3. Despite initial challenges, Shalini mastered the art of hosting and adapted to her new lifestyle.
  4. She is known for her love for art and philanthropic work.
“It was a very good move by the universe because I had so much energy and enthusiasm back then. What happens with women is later in their life, the energy and recovery gets extremely different. When young, you recover early. I became a mom at 21. Because I was young, I used to get more excited than my son when I took him to a toy store. Its like I am almost living my life in reverse.”

Shalini Passi reflects on her young marriage and motherhood, emphasizing her enthusiasm and energy during that period.
newTitle: Shalini Passi: Marrying Young at 20, Motherhood at 21, and Zero Regrets

title: Hidden Love actor Zhao Lusi's pic in wheelchair goes viral, team shares statement - India Today
summary:
Chinese Actress Zhao Lusi Hospitalized: Team Suspends Work for Recovery

Published on Dec 30, 2024, by Zinia Bandyopadhyay

Chinese actress Zhao Lusi, known for her role in Hidden Love, was recently hospitalized, sparking concerns over her health. Her team shared a statement announcing a suspension of all work commitments to allow for a speedy recovery.

  • Zhao was seen in a wheelchair as she was rushed to the hospital on December 18, with footage of the incident going viral on social media.
  • Speculations about her health have been circulating, with online rumors pointing to severe depression or a neurological condition, possibly due to work-related stress.
  • Zhao's management confirmed she has suspended all work commitments due to a health crisis but withheld details about her condition.
"After Ms. Zhao Lusi confirmed to play the role of Ruan Yu in the project 'Lovers', she actively carried out preparatory work and fulfilled the purpose of the contract. [...] We will prioritise the health of Ms. Zhao Lusi and suspend all subsequent work. We also hope that everyone who cares about Lusi will give her space to rest physically and mentally."

Zhao, 26, began her acting journey in 2017 and has starred in hit series like The Romance of Tiger and Rose, Dating in the Kitchen, Love Better Than Immortality, Love Like the Galaxy, and Hidden Love.
newTitle: Chinese Actress Zhao Lusi Hospitalized: Team Suspends Work for Recovery

In a dramatic turn of events on the popular show Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin, Savi realizes her feelings for Rajat just as he is about to leave for Singapore. This confrontation leads to a heartfelt moment where both characters express their love for each other.

  • Savi rushes to the airport with Rajat’s mom, Bhagyashree, as Rajat prepares to leave.
  • Rajat believes he is a burden to Savi and plans to move to Singapore permanently.
  • After a series of misunderstandings and manipulations by a character named Arsh, Rajat and Savi's relationship faces turmoil.
  • Ultimately, Savi confronts Rajat at the airport and they share an emotional embrace, leading Rajat to cancel his trip.
“I love you,” Savi expresses as she tries to stop Rajat from leaving.

This pivotal moment showcases the deep emotional connection between Savi and Rajat, hinting at future developments in their relationship.
newTitle: Savi Confesses Her Love for Rajat at the Airport in Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin

title: BTS postpones content releases, expresses condolences for Jeju Air tragedy - allkpop
summary:
BTS Postpones Content Releases and Honors Victims of Jeju Air Tragedy

Publication Date: December 30, 2024 | Source: allkpop

BTS and their agency, BIGHIT MUSIC, have expressed their condolences for the victims of the Jeju Air tragedy that occurred on December 29th, resulting in significant loss of life.

  • BIGHIT MUSIC announced the postponement of content releases, including Episode 16 of 'Run Jin'.
  • The Jeju Air tragedy led to 179 fatalities out of 181 passengers.
  • Nationwide mourning is taking place, impacting events in the entertainment industry.
“We extend our deepest condolences and sympathies to the victims of the aviation accident and their families.” - BIGHIT MUSIC

This incident has profoundly affected the community, prompting many in the entertainment industry to show their respect by canceling or postponing events.
newTitle: BTS Postpones Content Releases and Honors Victims of Jeju Air Tragedy

title: Only 1 Indian actor made it to The Independent's list of Best Actors of 21st century. It's not Shah Rukh Khan, Amitabh - Hindustan Times
summary:
The Independent listed 60 best actors of the 21st century. Not Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan or Amitabh Bachchan, but this Indian actor made the cut.

Date: Dec 30, 2024 | Source: The Independent

The Independent has curated a list of the 60 best actors of the 21st century. Notably, the list includes international talents while specifically excluding performances from films released after 2000.

  • Irrfan Khan is the only Indian actor to be featured on the list, ranked at #41.
  • Other prominent Indian actors such as Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan, and Amitabh Bachchan are absent from this list.
  • The late actor celebrated for his roles in films such as The Warrior, Haasil, and Life of Pi.
  • Philip Seymour Hoffman was recognized as the best actor, with female representation by Emma Stone, ranked at #2.
“It’s Irrfan Khan’s eyes, hooded and deep brown, that will live eternally. They granted him the ability to weave magic, to recite poetry without moving his lips.”

The recognition of Irrfan Khan amidst international talents highlights his impactful performances and legacy in cinema.
newTitle: Irrfan Khan Among The Best Actors of 21st Century According to The Independent
